Articles.Content:
So I’ve lost my save twice now. Luckily the first time I had a backup in PS+. But this time I saved my game then quit and uploaded my save to the PS+ cloud. When I came back to play ,it said “could not load save” so I am screwed cause my back up is a corrupted file. I seriously don’t know why this happened. Last time I quit I made sure to wait for the save icon to go away, and then I quit the game. This needs to be fixed.

 

and one more thing since, I now have to start a new game AGAIN! If I give myself like 1000 extra science/money at the start of my new game, will that disable trophies? I want to try and earn all trophies.
